name: SupportNetworkOrSocialNetwork
title: Support Network or Social Network
description: Assessment of the adequacy of the patient's social support systems (Business ID: Entry 2200728)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Support Network or Social Network.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the adequacy of the patient's social support systems.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Support Network or Social Network.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Support Network or Social Network.)
